mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(order_product_number, review_content, review_image, rating, reg_date, user_id, product_number, product_name ) VALUES (#{orderProductNumber}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewImage:VARCHAR}, #{rating}, now(), #{userId}, #{orderProduct.productNumber}, #{orderProduct.productName})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, p.product_group_number, p.product_main_image FROM review r, product p WHERE r.product_number = p.product_number AND r.review_number = #{reviewNumber}
